title: Major floods in the U.S. from 1900 to 2016 , by number of people affected
summary: The Major floods Date, in the from 1900 was Date, Jan_15_-_Jan_21_1996_Nevada_Arizona_New_Mexico , who made 11000148 people .
The most floods Date, was Jan_1_-_Feb_07_1997_Nevada_Idaho_California , with just 30000 people .

In second place was Date, Aug_9_-_Aug_16_2016_Louisiana_Mississippi_MissouriIllinois_Indiana with 330000 people ; third place went to Date, Jun_9_-_Jun_30_2008_Illinois_Iowa_Kansas with 11000148 people ; fourth place went to Date, Dec_29_2008_-_Jan_16_2009_Orting_Chehalus with 30000 people and fifth place went to Date, Jun_30_-_Jul_23_2002_New_Braunfels_Bandera , who was 144000 people .

gold: The statistic shows the major floods that have occurred in the United States from 1900 to 2016 , that affected the most people . Approximately 11 million people were affected by the flood that took place in June 2008 in the United States .
